org.mariuszgromada.math.mxparser

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mariuszgromada.math.mxparser.Expression

  • public class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
    Expression - base class for real expressions definition. Examples:
    • '1+2'
    • 'sin(x)+1'
    • 'asin(3*x)^10-log(4,8)'
    • in general 'f(x1,x2,...,xn)' where x1,...,xn are real arguments

    Class provides easy way to define multivariate arithmetic expression.

    Version:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Mariusz Gromada
    mariuszgromada.org@gmail.com
    MathSpace.pl
    MathParser.org - mXparser project page
    mXparser on GitHub
    mXparser on SourceForge

    mXparser on CodePlex
    Janet Sudoku - project web page
    Janet Sudoku on GitHub
    Janet Sudoku on CodePlex
    Janet Sudoku on SourceForge
    Janet Sudoku on BitBucket
    See Also:
    Argument, RecursiveArgument, Constant, Function
